text: Ngāti is a 1987 New Zealand drama movie directed by Barry Barclay and starring Wi Kuki Kaa and Judy McIntosh. The spoken languages in the movie are Māori and English. ==References== ==Other websites== *Watch Ngati movie clip at NZ On Screen *Official NZ Government Film website * *Interview with director Barry Barclay on YouTube Category:1987 drama movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Cancer in movies
title: Ngati
